name: claude-afk
description: Remote notifications and responses for Claude Code sessions

scripts.test: node --test scripts/cli.test.js scripts/permission-handler.test.js scripts/stop-handler.test.js scripts/daemon/index.test.js scripts/daemon/ipc.test.js scripts/daemon/sessions.test.js scripts/daemon/singleton.test.js scripts/daemon/telegram.test.js scripts/daemon/transcript.test.js hooks/session-start.test.js
scripts.test:watch: node --test --watch scripts/cli.test.js scripts/permission-handler.test.js scripts/stop-handler.test.js scripts/daemon/index.test.js scripts/daemon/ipc.test.js scripts/daemon/sessions.test.js scripts/daemon/singleton.test.js scripts/daemon/telegram.test.js scripts/daemon/transcript.test.js hooks/session-start.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:coverage: node --test --experimental-test-coverage scripts/cli.test.js scripts/permission-handler.test.js scripts/stop-handler.test.js scripts/daemon/index.test.js scripts/daemon/ipc.test.js scripts/daemon/sessions.test.js scripts/daemon/singleton.test.js scripts/daemon/telegram.test.js scripts/daemon/transcript.test.js hooks/session-start.test.js

author: Claude AFK Contributors
